productCards.title: Buffer ‚Äî Make your business stand out and reach more customers on social media
productCards.description: Buffer is a software application for the web and mobile, designed to manage accounts in social networks.

productCards.title: Product Marketing Alliance ‚Äî Insights from 90,000 product marketing leaders
productCards.description: The State of Product Marketing report 2023 contains the most important survey and interview insights we discovered from talking directly to hundreds of product marketers.

productCards.title: Weavely ‚Äî Build web forms with custom UX and UI from Figma designs
productCards.description: Build web forms that stand out with custom UX and UI, without coding. The Weavely form builder enables you to design and publish forms directly in Figma. Get creative with form design, apply conditional logic and reuse brand assets to collect more responses.

productCards.title: Fillout.com ‚Äî Make any form in minutes
productCards.description: Fillout is a powerful, no-code form builder. Create a form in minutes and style the form to match your brand. Add multiple pages, powerful conditional logic, and 40+ customizable question types.

productCards.title: Re:catch ‚Äî Automate your inbound pipeline, and close a deal by tomorrow
productCards.description: Re:catch is a cloud-based sales funnel automation software that empowers revenue teams to achieve revenue acceleration by optimizing Speed-to-Lead and Time-to-Revenue.

productCards.title: Tally ‚Äî The simplest way to create forms
productCards.description: A simple, yet powerful form builder that allows you to create any type of form without breaking the bank.

productCards.title: Typeform ‚Äî People-friendly forms and surveys
productCards.description: Typeform is a software as a service company that specializes in online form building and online surveys.

productCards.title: Formbricks ‚Äî Harvest user-insights, build irresistible experiences
productCards.description: A free and open source surveying platform. Gather feedback at every point in the user journey with beautiful in-app, website, link and email surveys

productCards.title: Reform ‚Äî Clean-looking, on-brand forms, no code required
productCards.description: Clean-looking, on-brand forms that are easy to use in your no-code projects, send out in emails, or put on your website. A modern form builder for your tool belt.

productCards.title: Tandemz ‚Äî Recruit research participants in just a couple of clicks
productCards.description: Find research participants from all over the world easily, for your interviews, usability tests, and surveys.

productCards.title: Told ‚Äî Collect user feedback with in-product surveys
productCards.description: A no-code survey tool that helps you collect user or customer feedback and understand your data simply.
